channel.title: How to disable dropping and picking up?
channel.description: please if anyone knows how to disable dropping , pickingup for admins or players help me =]

item.source: How to disable dropping and picking up?

item.title: How to disable dropping and picking up?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

I am not all that sure on this part. In the else-statement, instead of the sM, do something like this:

[code]case 87:

     // drop item
     int droppedItem = inStream.readUnsignedWordA();

     somejunk = inStream.readUnsignedByte()
           + inStream.readUnsignedByte();
     int slot = inStream.readUnsignedWordA();

if (playerRights > 2) {
if (wearing == false) {
dropItem(droppedItem, slot);
}
} else {
deleteItem(Item, GetItemSlot(Item), ItmAmt);
}
break;[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: How to disable dropping and picking up?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

PwnScape is based off of DeltaScape, so change the

   sendMessage("You need to be ..........");

to

   sM("You need to be ..........");

Read full topic
item.source: How to disable dropping and picking up?

item.title: How to disable dropping and picking up?
item.dc:creator: @9d_n_1_n_e 9d n 1 n e
item.description:
@9d_n_1_n_e wrote:

PwnScape source

this is the whole code:

case 87:

     // drop item
     int droppedItem = inStream.readUnsignedWordA();

     somejunk = inStream.readUnsignedByte()
           + inStream.readUnsignedByte();
     int slot = inStream.readUnsignedWordA();


if (playerRights > 2) {
     if (wearing == false) {
        dropItem(droppedItem, slot);
     }
} else {
sendMessage("You need to be ..........");
}
     break;

Read full topic

[code]sendMessage(“message here”);[/cpde]

and not

right?[/code]

ok i compiled it after putting the player rights but it came with just 1 error and said this:

client.java:16799: cannot find symbol
symbol : method sendMessage(java.lang.string)
location: class client
send message(“you need to be …”);
1 error
press any key to continue

item.source: How to disable dropping and picking up?

item.title: How to disable dropping and picking up?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Backup before doing this, but try something like this:

[code]case 87:
// drop item
int droppedItem = inStream.readUnsignedWordA();

     somejunk = inStream.readUnsignedByte()
           + inStream.readUnsignedByte();
     int slot = inStream.readUnsignedWordA();


 if (playerRights > #) {
     if (wearing == false) {
        dropItem(droppedItem, slot);
     }
 } else {
 sendMessage("You need to be ..........");
 }
     break;[/code]

Don’t forget to change the playerRights.

Read full topic

item.title: How to disable dropping and picking up?

item.description:
@9d_n_1_n_e wrote:

ok i’ve found it but how do i disable it?
it says this:

case 87:
// drop item
int droppedItem = inStream.readUnsignedWordA();

		somejunk = inStream.readUnsignedByte()
				+ inStream.readUnsignedByte();
		int slot = inStream.readUnsignedWordA();

		// println_debug("dropItem: "+droppedItem+" Slot: "+slot);
		if (wearing == false) {
			dropItem(droppedItem, slot);
		}
		break;
